mapper.select: SELECT area_name AS regionName FROM md_administrative_region WHERE grade=3

SELECT mar.area_name AS regionName, IFNULL(t_a.oxygen,0) AS oxygen, IFNULL(t_a.phosphorus,0) AS phosphorus, IFNULL(t_a.permanganate,0) AS permanganate, IFNULL(t_a.AN,0) AS AN FROM md_administrative_region mar LEFT JOIN ( SELECT mar.area_name AS regionName, ROUND(AVG(wqg.`DO`),2) AS oxygen, ROUND(AVG(wqg.total_phosphorus),2) AS phosphorus, ROUND(AVG(wqg.permanganate_index),2) AS permanganate, ROUND(AVG(wqg.ammonia_nitrogen),2) AS AN FROM water_quality_grade wqg, md_section ms, md_administrative_region mar WHERE wqg.`name`=ms.`NAME` AND mar.area_code=ms.COUNTYID AND ms.SECTIONLEVEL=3 GROUP BY regionName )t_a ON mar.area_name = t_a.regionName WHERE mar.grade=3

SELECT t_c.regionId, t_c.regionName, 0.7*SUM(t_c.grade) AS grade FROM ( SELECT mar.area_code AS regionId, mar.area_name AS regionName, 10-IF(IFNULL(t_b.problem_deduction, 0) > 10, 10, IFNULL(t_b.problem_deduction, 0)) as grade FROM md_administrative_region mar LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(t_a.spotcheck_region,',',b.help_topic_id+1),',',-1) AS region, t_a.problem_type_name, t_a.problem_deduction FROM ( SELECT ssp.problem_type_name, ssp.spotcheck_region, ssp.problem_deduction, ss.check_date FROM sc_spotcheck_problem ssp, illegal_xize ix, sc_spotcheck ss WHERE ssp.problem_type_name=ix.GRADEDETAILED AND ssp.spotcheck_id=ss.ID AND ss.check_date=#{date} AND ssp.problem_type_name IN('水体感官色度异常', '水体有异味') )t_a JOIN mysql.help_topic b ON b.help_topic_id < (LENGTH(t_a.spotcheck_region)-LENGTH(REPLACE(t_a.spotcheck_region, ',', ''))+1) )t_b ON t_b.region=mar.area_name WHERE mar.grade=3 GROUP BY mar.area_code UNION ALL SELECT mar.area_code AS regionId, mar.area_name AS regionName, 20-IF(IFNULL(t_b.problem_deduction, 0) > 20, 20, IFNULL(t_b.problem_deduction, 0)) as grade FROM md_administrative_region mar LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(t_a.spotcheck_region,',',b.help_topic_id+1),',',-1) AS region, t_a.problem_type_name, t_a.problem_deduction FROM ( SELECT ssp.problem_type_name, ssp.spotcheck_region, ssp.problem_deduction, ss.check_date FROM sc_spotcheck_problem ssp, illegal_xize ix, sc_spotcheck ss WHERE ssp.problem_type_name=ix.GRADEDETAILED AND ssp.spotcheck_id=ss.ID AND ss.check_date=#{date} AND ssp.problem_type_name IN('在市管河道设置的口门排水前，未向所在河道管理单位报告擅自排水', '在市管河道设置的口门排水后，未向口门所在河道管理单位报备实际排水情况','发现口门排放','于桥水库周边沟道排水未达到入库水质标准') )t_a JOIN mysql.help_topic b ON b.help_topic_id < (LENGTH(t_a.spotcheck_region)-LENGTH(REPLACE(t_a.spotcheck_region, ',', ''))+1) )t_b ON t_b.region=mar.area_name WHERE mar.grade=3 GROUP BY mar.area_code UNION ALL SELECT mar.area_code AS regionId, mar.area_name AS regionName, 10-IFNULL(SUM(t_b.num),0) as grade FROM md_administrative_region mar LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sdr.assess, IF(sdr.status = 1, 2, 0) AS num FROM sewage_dispose_report sdr, sewage_dispose sd WHERE sdr.parentId=sd.id AND sd.status=0 AND sdr.status=1 AND sd.issue=#{date} )t_b ON t_b.assess=mar.area_name WHERE mar.grade=3 GROUP BY mar.area_code )t_c GROUP BY t_c.regionId ORDER BY t_c.regionId

SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(t_a.spotcheck_region,',',b.help_topic_id+1),',',-1) AS region, t_a.problem_type_name, t_a.problem_deduction FROM ( SELECT ssp.problem_type_name, ssp.spotcheck_region, ssp.problem_deduction, ss.check_date FROM sc_spotcheck_problem ssp, illegal_xize ix, sc_spotcheck ss WHERE ssp.problem_type_name=ix.GRADEDETAILED AND ssp.spotcheck_id=ss.ID AND ss.check_date=#{date} IFNULL(t_b.problem_deduction, 0)) as grade FROM md_administrative_region mar LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(t_a.spotcheck_region,',',b.help_topic_id+1),',',-1) AS region, JOIN ( SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(t_a.spotcheck_region,',',b.help_topic_id+1),',',-1) AS region, t_a.problem_type_name, t_a.problem_deduction FROM ( SELECT ssp.problem_type_name, (LENGTH(t_a.spotcheck_region)-LENGTH(REPLACE(t_a.spotcheck_region, ',', ''))+1) )t_b ON t_b.region=mar.area_name WHERE mar.grade=3 GROUP BY mar.area_code UNION ALL SELECT mar.area_code AS regionId, mar.area_name AS regionName, 20-IF(IFNULL(t_b.problem_deduction, 0) > 20, 20, IFNULL(t_b.problem_deduction, 0)) as grade FROM md_administrative_region mar LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SELECT mar.area_code AS regionId, mar.area_name AS regionName, 50-IFNULL(t_a.num, 0) as grade FROM md_administrative_region mar LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * ,IF(5*COUNT(0) < 50, 5*COUNT(0), 50) as num FROM ( SELECT sse.river_name, term_number, region_name, dissatisfied_reason FROM sh_social_evaluation sse WHERE sse.is_satisfied=0 AND sse.term_number=#{date} GROUP BY river_name )t_a GROUP BY region_name )t_a ON t_a.region_name=mar.area_name WHERE mar.grade=3 ORDER BY mar.area_code

SELECT mar.area_code AS regionId, mar.area_name AS regionName, 25-IFNULL(t_a.num, 0) as grade FROM md_administrative_region mar LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ssr.region_name, IF((5*COUNT(0) < 25), 5*COUNT(0), 25) AS num FROM sh_social_report ssr WHERE ssr.processing_status = '未处理' AND ssr.report_evaluate='2' AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() > ssr.over_time AND ssr.report_source!= '微信公众号' AND ssr.report_source!='河长门户' AND DATE_FORMAT(ssr.report_date, '%Y-%m')=#{date} GROUP BY ssr.region_name )t_a ON t_a.region_name=mar.area_name WHERE mar.grade=3 ORDER BY mar.area_code

SELECT mar.area_code AS regionId, mar.area_name AS regionName, 25-IFNULL(t_a.num, 0) as grade FROM md_administrative_region mar LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ssr.region_name, IF((5*COUNT(0) < 25), 5*COUNT(0), 25) AS num FROM sh_social_report ssr WHERE ssr.processing_status = '未处理' AND ssr.report_evaluate='2' AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() > ssr.over_time AND ssr.report_source= '微信公众号' OR ssr.report_source='河长门户' AND DATE_FORMAT(ssr.report_date, '%Y-%m')=#{date} GROUP BY ssr.region_name )t_a ON t_a.region_name=mar.area_name WHERE mar.grade=3 ORDER BY mar.area_code
